Features

Door leaves are made only standard size:

2000 х 610 мм

2000 х 710 мм

2000 х 810 мм

2000 х 910 мм

HARDWARE IS NOT CUTTED

Always on stock:

OPTIMA-05 (oak norton / maple grey / maple white)

1. Door leaf

Made from MDF layer and finished with Touchline film with 3-D effect and structure of natural wood.

2. Door frame

MDF with decoration of Touchline film, noise-preventive sealant.

3. Door platband

MDF with decoration of Touchline film. Produced with 10 mm.

4. Door Frame Extension

MDF with decoration of Touchline film. Produced with 100mm and 200mm width.

5. Infill

MDF with finishing of ecologinfill

6. Glass

Satin glass colorless.
